Item.UnlockDescription: Bloomberry will now sometimes yield seeds when harvested.
Item.StartupSpeech: Hey $, if you're heading into Rai anytime soon I was wondering if you could grab me something. # I've been wanting those little blue berry bushes to grow on my farm. # Bring me five of them and I'll teach you the secret harvesting their seeds!

MidQuestSkeleton.SelectableOptions: How can I harvest Bloomberry? ~It's easy, just find one in Rai and grab it. # Once you have all five come bring them back to me.,Nevermind ~ ExitDialogue

Item.CompletionSpeech: Ah yes these are perfect. As promised, here's the secret to growing Bloomberry.

Item.UnlockDescription: BloodCorn will now sometimes yield seeds when harvested.
Item.StartupSpeech: Hey $, if you're heading into Rai anytime soon I was wondering if you could grab me something. # I've been wanting BloodCorn bushes to grow on my farm. # Bring me five of them and I'll teach you the secret harvesting their seeds!

MidQuestSkeleton.SelectableOptions: How can I harvest Bloomberry? ~It's easy, just find one in Rai and grab it. # Once you have all five come bring them back to me.,Nevermind ~ ExitDialogue

Item.CompletionSpeech: Ah yes these are perfect. As promised, here's the secret to growing BloodCorn.
